properties.name: core.redirects.filter.keepParams
properties.description: If true, the url params of redirected urls will be written to the targetUrl. They might be overwritten by targetUrlParams of the redirect.

properties.name: core.redirects.path
properties.description: The path where the Redirect documents are stored relative the selected site.

properties.name: core.redirects.cache.parallel.site.recompute.threads
properties.description: The number of threads to parse the redirects of new sites (used during CAE startUp). Defaults to the number of sites.

properties.name: core.redirects.cache.parallel.item.recompute.threads
properties.description: The number of threads to parse changed redirects (used at CAE runtime).
